author: Jack Royston
title: Queen Elizabeth II Moved Many to Tears as She Invoked the War Effort in Rousing Coronavirus Address
description: Queen Elizabeth II addressed her nation as she sought to put her country in World War II survival mode and hoped "those who come after us will say the Britons of this generation were as strong as any."
content:
Queen Elizabeth II's landmark coronavirus speech brought many in Britain to tearsand moved a lifelong critic to declare her among the "most remarkable people alive."
She invoked the country's World War II spirit when she praised those selfisolating, and prom… [+8489 chars]
